mutants.code:
from collections import deque

def custom_fib(signature, indexes, n):
    fib = deque(signature)
    for _ in range(n):
        next_value = sum((fib[i] for i in indexes))
        fib.append(next_value)
        fib.popleft()
    return fib[1]

from collections import deque

def custom_fib(signature, indexes, n):
    fib = deque(signature)
    for _ in range(n):
        next_value = sum((fib[i] for i in indexes))
        fib.append(next_value)
        fib.popleft()
    return fib[-1]

from collections import deque

def custom_fib(signature, indexes, n):
    fib = deque(signature)
    for _ in range(n):
        next_value = sum((fib[i] for i in indexes))
        fib.append(next_value)
        fib.popleft()
    return fib[1]
